page.title: Export Data
page.description: Export your financial data in various formats

card.title: Export Configuration
card.description: Select the data type, period, and format you want to export

messages.errorAccessDeniedDescription: This feature requires a Wealth tier subscription
messages.errorFailedDescription: Failed to export data. Please try again.

info.title: About Data Export
info.point1: Exports include all records for the selected month and year
info.point2: CSV files can be opened in Excel, Google Sheets, or any spreadsheet application
info.point3: This feature is available exclusively for Wealth tier subscribers
info.point4: Additional export formats may be added in future updates
